metadata.title: Wednesday, 2nd March, 2016
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Vice President and Minister of Development
parts: (a)    what the breakdown of the K140,610.89 spent on the activities to commemorate the National Day of Prayer held on 18th October, 2015, is;
(b)    which budget line was used to meet the expenditure; and
(c)    how much money has been budgeted for the event in 2016, considering that the National Day of Prayer has been declared an annual event.

questions.minister: Minister of Works and Supply when the following roads in Malambo Parliamentary Constituency will be rehabilitated
